Translations.Text: Klyanus' utrenney zarey
i desyat'yu nochami
Klyanus' chetoy i yedinitsey
Klyanus' etoy noch'yu, kotoraya idet
A v etom ne klyatva li dlya rassuditel'nogo
ne videl li ty, kak postupil Gospod' tvoy s Gadyanami
zhitelyami Irema, sostoyavshego iz velikolepnykh zdaniy
podobnykh kotorym ne sozdavalos' v etoy strane
S Femudyanami, kotoryye v skalakh pri ikh doline vysekali sebe zhilishcha
S Faraonom, vladykoyu stolbov
Oni buystvovali v etikh gorodakh
I v nikh rasprostranyali nechestiye
Za to Gospod' tvoy prolil na nikh bich nakazaniya
Potomu chto Gospod' tvoy na meste nablyudeniya
Tak, chto zhe chelovek? Kak skoro Gospod' yego, ispytyvaya yego, vozvyshayet yego, oblagotvoryayet yego; togda on govorit: "Gospod' moy vozvyshayet menya
A kak skoro On, ispytyvaya yego, ogranichivayet dlya nego zhiznennyye potrebnosti; togda on govorit: "Gospod' moy unizhayet menya
Da; a sami oni ne oblagodetel'stvuyut sirogo
Poyest' s soboy khleba ne privetyat nishchego
Pozhirayut nasledstva, pozhiraya ikh zhadno
Lyubyat bogatstvo, lyubya yego strastno
Da, kogda zemlya razmel'chitsya, sdelavshis' kuskami, kuskami
Kogda Gospod' tvoy pridet, i s nim angely, stoya ryadami, ryadami
V tot den', kogda privedetsya geyenna, v tot den' chelovek razmyslit - no chto prineset yemu eto razmyshleniye
On skazhet: "O yesli by ya v moyey zhizni zapassya dobrym
V tot den' nikto tak ne nakazhet, kak nakazyvayet On
Nikto ne nalozhit takikh okov, kakiye okovy nalagayet On
A ty, upovaniyem pokoivshayasya dusha
Vozvratis' ko Gospodu svoyemu, buduchi udovletvorennoyu, udovletvorivsheyu
Voydi v sredu slug Moikh
Voydi v ray Moy
